attributes.additional_details: The Will Of The People Must Be Listened Too. Parliament Asked The Public And We Gave The Instruction. Now Everyday Democracy In Our Country Is Being Threatened.
attributes.background: In June 2016 The British Electorate Took Part In A "Once Of A Lifetime Referendum" On Our EU Membership With Constant Warnings The Result Would Be Final. However Ever Since The Results Of The Referendum Was Released Remain Mp's and Remain Voters Have Tried Everything To Delay It.

rejection.details:
You need to give your full name to start a petition. 

Article 50 has not been delayed or revoked. You could start a new petition asking the UK Parliament and Government to not delay or revoke Article 50, if that's what you'd like to happen. 

You might also like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
